message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and value, it's worth noting that the product is valued at $15,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true market value and ensures you receive the best possible deal. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this remarkable product into your possession soon.
